title: Small cursor in game
body: Every time i play my cursor is small and my settings. I change my resolution to 3200 x 1800 to 2048 x 1536 and still doesn't change. I'm currently using windows 10.

replies.body: does anyone know how to make your in-game cursor smaller?

Hey there,

When you say your cursor is small do you mean it reverts to the Windows default cursor rather than the in-game one?

I experience this issue myself if I'm running skype in the background and tab out of league at all.
No, my cursor is big as the normal cursor in windows. I tried changing the size of my cursor in settings but its still the same in game.
What resolution do you currently run the game at?

Well, there's your problem.

You'll have to lower your resolution or put up with it.
